message: Let's split it 50/50 to start, a fair and simple approach.
I'll take 60% of the money, a fair compromise, but I'll give you 40%.
I'll give you a larger share, but I think 70% is too much. Let's try 30/70 instead.

I'm getting desperate, but I'll try to hold out for a better deal. Let's see if we can get to 15/85 this time.
I'll take 88% of the money, but I'll give you 12%, it's getting late and I'm not getting any younger.
I'm running out of options, but I'll try to hold on to some value. Let's see if we can get to 10/90 this time.
I'll take 92% of the money, but I'll give you 8%, it's almost the last chance to get something, don't be greedy.
I'm almost out of options, but I'll try to get something. Let's see if we can get to 5/95 this time.
I'll take 98% of the money, it's the last round, and I'm taking what I can get.
